sqlMap.select: SELECT CATEGORY_ID ,CATEGORY_NAME ,CATEGORY_SEQ_ID ,CATEGORY_TYPE ,COLOR ,DESCRIPTION ,PORTAL_ID ,REGISTER_ID ,REGISTER_NAME ,REGIST_DATE ,DELETE_YN ,BOARD_ID FROM ikep4_officesupplies_category WHERE DELETE_YN = 'Y' AND BOARD_ID = #boardId# ORDER BY CATEGORY_SEQ_ID, CATEGORY_ID
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ikep4_officesupplies_category SET DELETE_YN = 'N' WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #delIdList# AND BOARD_ID = #boardId#
UPDATE ikep4_officesupplies_category SET CATEGORY_NAME = #updateNameList#, CATEGORY_SEQ_ID=#alignList# WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #updateIdList# AND BOARD_ID = #boardId#
UPDATE ikep4_officesupplies_category SET CATEGORY_SEQ_ID=#categorySeqId# WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = #alignList# AND BOARD_ID = #boardId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ikep4_officesupplies ( officesupplies_id, product_name, product_no, register_id, register_name, regist_date, updater_id, updater_name, update_date, price2, unit, status1, price1, amount1, category1, category2, remark, team_id ) VALUES ( #officesuppliesId#, #productName#, #productNo#, #registerId#, #registerName#, GETDATE(), #updaterId#, #updaterName#, GETDATE(), #price2#, #unit#, #status1#, #price1#, #amount1#, #category1#, #category2#, #remark#, #teamId# )
sqlMap.select: select top 1 user_id as userId from ikep4_ev_user where user_id in (select user_id from IKEP4_EV_USER where user_id in( select user_id from IKEP4_EV_USER_GROUP where group_id = ( select group_id from IKEP4_EV_USER_GROUP where user_id = #userId# and group_id in (select group_id from IKEP4_EV_GROUP where group_type_id = 'G0001' and view_option = '1'))) and user_status = 'C' and leader = '1' and job_duty_code in ('18','68','19') )
SELECT COUNT(product_no) FROM ikep4_officesupplies_except WHERE product_no = #productNo#
SELECT count(*) FROM ikep4_officesupplies_period WHERE year = #year#
sqlMap.insert:
DECLARE @I INT
SET @I = 1
WHILE @I < 13 BEGIN
INSERT INTO ikep4_officesupplies_period ( year, month, status ) VALUES ( #year#, @I, 'N' ) SET @I = @I + 1 END
sqlMap.select: SELECT count(*) FROM ikep4_officesupplies_period WHERE current_timestamp between start_date and DATEADD(DD, +1, end_date) and status = 'Y' and year+convert(varchar(2), Right('0'+Ltrim(Str(month)),2), 112) = convert(varchar(6), start_date, 112)
select count(*) from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager where team_manager_id = #userId# and use_yn = 'Y'
select count(*) from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager where team_leader_id = #userId# and use_yn = 'Y'

select count(*) from ikep4_officesupplies where register_id = #userId# and team_id = #teamId#
AND UPPER(product_name) LIKE '%' + UPPER(#searchWord#) + '%'
AND product_no LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'A'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'R'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'C'
and status1 = 'A' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'R' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'C' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'S' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'T' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = #status1#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) >= #searchStartDate#

select count(*) from ikep4_officesupplies where 1=1 and status1 in ('S','C','A','R')
AND UPPER(product_name) LIKE '%' + UPPER(#searchWord#) + '%'
AND product_no LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'A'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'R'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'C'
and status1 = 'A' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'R' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'C' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'S' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and team_id in (select team_id from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager where team_manager_id = #userId#)
and team_id = #teamId#
and team_id in (select team_id from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager where team_leader_id = #userId#)
and team_id = #teamId#
and status1 = #status1#
and team_id = #teamId#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) >= #searchStartDate#

select count(*) from ikep4_officesupplies where 1=1
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) >= #searchStartDate#
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'A'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'R'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'C'
and status1 = 'A' and isnull(status2,'') =''
select team_id as teamId, team_name as teamName from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager where use_yn = 'Y' and (team_leader_id = #userId# or team_manager_id = #userId#) order by team_name
select team_id as teamId, team_name as teamName from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager where use_yn = 'Y' order by team_name

select isnull(sum(o.price2),0) from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager m left outer join ikep4_officesupplies o on m.team_id = o.team_id and use_yn = 'Y' and o.status1 = 'A'
AND convert(varchar(6), o.regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), o.regist_date, 112) >= #searchStartDate#
and o.status1 = 'A' and o.status2 = 'A'
and o.status1 = 'A' and o.status2 = 'R'
and o.status1 = 'A' and o.status2 = 'C'
and o.status1 = 'A' and isnull(o.status2,'') =''

SELECT isnull(sum(A.price2),0) FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
ORDER BY product_no ASC
ORDER BY product_no DESC
ORDER BY product_name ASC
ORDER BY product_name DESC
ORDER BY convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) desc, team_id ASC, category1 asc
) AS NUM, officesupplies_id as officesuppliesId, product_name as productName, product_no as productNo, register_id as registerId, register_name as registerName, regist_date as registDate, updater_id as updaterId, updater_name as updaterName, update_date as updateDate, price2 as price2, unit as unit, status1 as status1, status2 as status2, price1 as price1, amount1 as amount1, category1 as category1, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category1) as categoryName1, category2 as category2, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category2) as categoryName2, remark as remark, team_id as teamId, (select group_name from IKEP4_EV_GROUP where group_id = team_id) as teamName FROM ikep4_officesupplies where 1=1 and status1 in ('S','C','A','R')
AND UPPER(product_name) LIKE '%' + UPPER(#searchWord#) + '%'
AND product_no LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'A'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'R'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'C'
and status1 = 'A' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'R' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'C' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'S' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and team_id in (select team_id from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager where team_manager_id = #userId#)
and team_id = #teamId#
and team_id in (select team_id from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager where team_leader_id = #userId#)
and team_id = #teamId#
and status1 = #status1#
and team_id = #teamId#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) >= #searchStartDate#
) A WHERE A.NUM <= #endRowIndex# AND A.NUM > #startRowIndex# /* 시작 */

SELECT isnull(sum(price2),0) FROM ikep4_officesupplies where 1=1 and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'A'
AND UPPER(product_name) LIKE '%' + UPPER(#searchWord#) + '%'
AND product_no LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
and team_id = #teamId#
and register_id = #userId#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) >= #searchStartDate#

SELECT isnull(sum(price2),0) FROM ikep4_officesupplies where 1=1 and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'A'
AND UPPER(product_name) LIKE '%' + UPPER(#searchWord#) + '%'
AND product_no LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
and team_id = #teamId#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) >= #searchStartDate#

SELECT isnull(sum(A.price2),0) FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
ORDER BY product_no ASC
ORDER BY product_no DESC
ORDER BY product_name ASC
ORDER BY product_name DESC
ORDER BY convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) desc, team_id ASC, category1 asc
) AS NUM, officesupplies_id as officesuppliesId, product_name as productName, product_no as productNo, register_id as registerId, register_name as registerName, regist_date as registDate, updater_id as updaterId, updater_name as updaterName, update_date as updateDate, price2 as price2, unit as unit, status1 as status1, status2 as status2, price1 as price1, amount1 as amount1, category1 as category1, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category1) as categoryName1, category2 as category2, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category2) as categoryName2, remark as remark, team_id as teamId, (select group_name from IKEP4_EV_GROUP where group_id = team_id) as teamName FROM ikep4_officesupplies where 1=1 and status1 in ('S','C','A','R')
AND UPPER(product_name) LIKE '%' + UPPER(#searchWord#) + '%'
AND product_no LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'A'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'R'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'C'
and status1 = 'A' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'R' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'C' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'S' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and team_id in (select team_id from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager where team_manager_id = #userId#)
and team_id = #teamId#
and team_id in (select team_id from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager where team_leader_id = #userId#)
and team_id = #teamId#
and status1 = #status1#
and team_id = #teamId#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) >= #searchStartDate#
) A

with cte1 as( SELECT team_id, STUFF((SELECT ',' + CONVERT(VarChar(50) , product_name) FROM ikep4_officesupplies AS B WHERE A.team_id = B.team_id
AND convert(varchar(6), B.regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), B.regist_date, 112) >= #searchStartDate#
and B.status1 = 'A' and B.status2 = 'A'
and B.status1 = 'A' and B.status2 = 'R'
and B.status1 = 'A' and B.status2 = 'C'
and B.status1 = 'A' and isnull(B.status2,'') =''
and B.status1 = 'A' FOR XML PATH ('')),1,1,'') AS product_name, count(product_no) as product_cnt, isnull(sum(price2),0) as price2 FROM ikep4_officesupplies AS A where A.status1 = 'A'
AND convert(varchar(6), A.regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), A.regist_date, 112) >= #searchStartDate#
and A.status1 = 'A' and A.status2 = 'A'
and A.status1 = 'A' and A.status2 = 'R'
and A.status1 = 'A' and A.status2 = 'C'
and A.status1 = 'A' and isnull(A.status2,'') =''
GROUP BY team_id)
select m.team_id as teamId,m.team_name as teamName, cte1.product_name as productName,cte1.product_cnt as productCnt, isnull(cte1.price2,0) as price2 from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager m inner join cte1 on m.team_id = cte1.team_id and m.use_yn = 'Y' group by m.team_id,m.team_name,cte1.product_name,cte1.product_cnt, cte1.price2 order by m.team_id

select convert(varchar(6), o.regist_date, 112) as registDate, g.group_name as teamId, o.product_no as productNo, o.product_name as productName, o.register_name as registerName, o.amount1 as amount1, o.unit as unit, o.price1 as price1, o.price2 as price2, o.category1 as category1, (select c.category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category c where c.category_id = o.category1) as categoryName1, o.category2 as category2, o.remark as remark, (select c.category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category c where c.category_id = o.category2) as categoryName2, case when o.status1 = 'S' then '신청' when o.status1 = 'A' then '팀장 승인' when o.status1 = 'R' then '팀장 반려' when o.status1 = 'C' then '팀담당자 상신' when o.status1 = 'T' then '임시저장' end as status1, case when o.status2 = 'A' then '담당부서팀장 확정' when o.status2 = 'C' then '담당부서 상신' when o.status2 = 'R' then '담당부서 반려' end as status2 from ikep4_officesupplies o inner join ikep4_ev_group g on o.team_id = g.group_id
AND convert(varchar(6), o.regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), o.regist_date, 112) <= #searchStartDate#
and o.status1 = 'A' and o.status2 = 'A'
and o.status1 = 'A' and o.status2 = 'R'
and o.status1 = 'A' and o.status2 = 'C'
and o.status1 = 'A' and isnull(o.status2,'') =''
AND o.status1 = 'A'
order by convert(varchar(6), o.regist_date, 112), g.group_name,o.product_no,o.product_name

SELECT isnull(sum(A.price2),0) FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
ORDER BY product_no ASC
ORDER BY product_no DESC
ORDER BY product_name ASC
ORDER BY product_name DESC
ORDER BY convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) desc, team_id ASC, category1 asc
) AS NUM, officesupplies_id as officesuppliesId, product_name as productName, product_no as productNo, register_id as registerId, register_name as registerName, regist_date as registDate, updater_id as updaterId, updater_name as updaterName, update_date as updateDate, price2 as price2, unit as unit, status1 as status1, status2 as status2, price1 as price1, amount1 as amount1, category1 as category1, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category1) as categoryName1, category2 as category2, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category2) as categoryName2, remark as remark, team_id as teamId, (select group_name from IKEP4_EV_GROUP where group_id = team_id) as teamName FROM ikep4_officesupplies where register_id = #userId# and team_id = #teamId#
AND UPPER(product_name) LIKE '%' + UPPER(#searchWord#) + '%'
AND product_no LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'A'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'R'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'C'
and status1 = 'A' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'R' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'C' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'S' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'T' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = #status1#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) >= #searchStartDate#
) A WHERE A.NUM <= #endRowIndex# AND A.NUM > #startRowIndex# /* 시작 */

SELECT isnull(sum(price2),0) FROM ikep4_officesupplies where register_id = #userId# and team_id = #teamId#
AND UPPER(product_name) LIKE '%' + UPPER(#searchWord#) + '%'
AND product_no LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'A'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'R'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'C'
and status1 = 'A' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'R' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'C' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'S' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'T' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = #status1#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) >= #searchStartDate#

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
ORDER BY product_no ASC
ORDER BY product_no DESC
ORDER BY product_name ASC
ORDER BY product_name DESC
ORDER BY convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) desc, team_id ASC, category1 asc
) AS NUM, officesupplies_id as officesuppliesId, product_name as productName, product_no as productNo, register_id as registerId, register_name as registerName, regist_date as registDate, updater_id as updaterId, updater_name as updaterName, update_date as updateDate, price2 as price2, unit as unit, status1 as status1, status2 as status2, price1 as price1, amount1 as amount1, category1 as category1, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category1) as categoryName1, category2 as category2, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category2) as categoryName2, remark as remark, team_id as teamId, (select group_name from IKEP4_EV_GROUP where group_id = team_id) as teamName FROM ikep4_officesupplies where register_id = #userId# and team_id = #teamId#
AND UPPER(product_name) LIKE '%' + UPPER(#searchWord#) + '%'
AND product_no LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'A'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'R'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'C'
and status1 = 'A' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'R' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'C' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'S' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'T' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = #status1#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) >= #searchStartDate#
) A WHERE A.NUM <= #endRowIndex# AND A.NUM > #startRowIndex# /* 시작 */

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
ORDER BY product_no ASC
ORDER BY product_no DESC
ORDER BY product_name ASC
ORDER BY product_name DESC
ORDER BY convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) desc, team_id ASC, category1 asc
) AS NUM, officesupplies_id as officesuppliesId, product_name as productName, product_no as productNo, register_id as registerId, register_name as registerName, regist_date as registDate, updater_id as updaterId, updater_name as updaterName, update_date as updateDate, price2 as price2, unit as unit, status1 as status1, status2 as status2, price1 as price1, amount1 as amount1, category1 as category1, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category1) as categoryName1, category2 as category2, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category2) as categoryName2, remark as remark, team_id as teamId, (select group_name from IKEP4_EV_GROUP where group_id = team_id) as teamName FROM ikep4_officesupplies where 1=1 and status1 in ('S','C','A','R')
AND UPPER(product_name) LIKE '%' + UPPER(#searchWord#) + '%'
AND product_no LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'A'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'R'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'C'
and status1 = 'A' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'R' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'C' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'S' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and team_id in (select team_id from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager where team_manager_id = #userId#)
and team_id = #teamId#
and team_id in (select team_id from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager where team_leader_id = #userId#)
and team_id = #teamId#
and status1 = #status1#
and team_id = #teamId#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) >= #searchStartDate#
) A WHERE A.NUM <= #endRowIndex# AND A.NUM > #startRowIndex# /* 시작 */

select convert(varchar(6), o.regist_date, 112) as registDate, g.group_name as teamId, o.product_no as productNo, o.product_name as productName, o.register_name as registerName, o.amount1 as amount1, o.unit as unit, o.price1 as price1, o.price2 as price2, o.category1 as category1, (select c.category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category c where c.category_id = o.category1) as categoryName1, o.category2 as category2, o.remark as remark, (select c.category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category c where c.category_id = o.category2) as categoryName2, case when o.status1 = 'S' then '신청' when o.status1 = 'A' then '팀장 승인' when o.status1 = 'R' then '팀장 반려' when o.status1 = 'C' then '팀담당자 상신' when o.status1 = 'T' then '임시저장' end as status1, case when o.status2 = 'A' then '담당부서팀장 확정' when o.status2 = 'C' then '담당부서 상신' when o.status2 = 'R' then '담당부서 반려' end as status2 from ikep4_officesupplies o inner join ikep4_ev_group g on o.team_id = g.group_id
and o.team_id = #teamId#
and o.status1 in ('S','C','A','R')
AND UPPER(o.product_name) LIKE '%' + UPPER(#searchWord#) + '%'
AND o.product_no LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
and o.status1 = 'A' and o.status2 = 'A'
and o.status1 = 'A' and o.status2 = 'R'
and vstatus1 = 'A' and o.status2 = 'C'
and o.status1 = 'A' and isnull(o.status2,'') =''
and o.status1 = 'R' and isnull(o.status2,'') =''
and o.status1 = 'C' and isnull(o.status2,'') =''
and o.status1 = 'S' and isnull(o.status2,'') =''
and o.status1 = #status1#
AND convert(varchar(6), o.regist_date, 112) <= #searchEndDate#
AND convert(varchar(6), o.regist_date, 112) >= #searchStartDate#
order by convert(varchar(6), o.regist_date, 112), g.group_name,o.product_no,o.product_name

with cte1 as( select m.team_id as team_id,m.team_name as team_name, #year#+c.CAL_MNT as cal_mnt from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager m left outer join ikep4_officesupplies_cal c on 1=1 and m.use_yn = 'Y'
and m.team_id = #teamId#
), cte2 as( select cte1.CAL_MNT as cal_mnt,cte1.team_id as team_id,cte1.team_name as team_name from cte1 where isnull(cte1.CAL_MNT,'') != '' )
select cte2.CAL_MNT as cal_mnt,cte2.team_id as team_id,cte2.team_name as team_name,isnull(sum(a.price2),0) as price2 from cte2 left outer join ikep4_officesupplies a on cte2.cal_mnt = convert(varchar(6), a.regist_date, 112) and cte2.team_id = a.team_id and A.status1 = 'A' and A.status2 = 'A' group by cte2.CAL_MNT, cte2.team_id,cte2.team_name order by cte2.team_name, cte2.CAL_MNT

select c.CAL_MNT as cal_mnt,isnull(sum(a.price2),0) as price2 from ikep4_officesupplies_cal c left outer join ikep4_officesupplies a on #year#+c.cal_mnt = convert(varchar(6), a.regist_date, 112) and A.status1 = 'A' and A.status2 = 'A'
and a.team_id = #teamId#
group by c.CAL_MNT order by c.CAL_MNT

select isnull(sum(a.price2),0) as price2 from ikep4_officesupplies a where convert(varchar(4), a.regist_date, 112) = #year# and a.status1 = 'A' and a.status2 = 'A'
and a.team_id = #teamId#

select count(*) from ikep4_officesupplies where approve_user_id = #userId# and is_delete = '0'
AND start_date < DATEADD(DD, 1, #endDate#)
AND end_date >= #startDate#

select count(*) from ikep4_officesupplies where is_delete = '0'
AND start_date < DATEADD(DD, 1, #endDate#)
AND end_date >= #startDate#

select count(*) from ikep4_officesupplies_except where 1=1
AND UPPER(product_name) LIKE '%' + UPPER(#searchWord#) + '%'
AND product_no LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'

select officesupplies_id as officesuppliesId, product_name as productName, product_no as productNo, register_id as registerId, register_name as registerName, regist_date as registDate, updater_id as updaterId, updater_name as updaterName, update_date as updateDate, price2 as price2, unit as unit, status1 as status1, status2 as status2, price1 as price1, amount1 as amount1, category1 as category1, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category1) as categoryName1, category2 as category2, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category2) as categoryName2, remark as remark, team_id as teamId, (select group_name from IKEP4_EV_GROUP where group_id = team_id) as teamName from ikep4_officesupplies where approve_user_id = #userId# and team_id = #teamId#

select officesupplies_id as officesuppliesId, product_name as productName, product_no as productNo, register_id as registerId, register_name as registerName, regist_date as registDate, updater_id as updaterId, updater_name as updaterName, update_date as updateDate, price2 as price2, unit as unit, status1 as status1, status2 as status2, price1 as price1, amount1 as amount1, team_id as teamId, (select group_name from IKEP4_EV_GROUP where group_id = team_id) as teamName from ikep4_officesupplies where team_id = #teamId#

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
ORDER BY product_no ASC
ORDER BY product_no DESC
ORDER BY product_name ASC
ORDER BY product_name DESC
ORDER BY convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) desc, team_id ASC, category1 asc
) AS NUM, product_no as productNo, product_name as productName FROM ikep4_officesupplies_except WHERE 1 = 1
AND UPPER(product_name) LIKE '%' + UPPER(#searchWord#) + '%'
AND product_no LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
) A WHERE A.NUM <= #endRowIndex# AND A.NUM > #startRowIndex# /* 시작 */
select product_no as productNo, product_name as productName FROM ikep4_officesupplies_except

select officesupplies_id as officesuppliesId, approve_user_id as approveUserId, (select user_name from ikep4_ev_user where user_id = approve_user_id) as approveUserName, approve_status as approveStatus, convert(varchar,start_date,102) as startDate, register_id as registerId, register_name as registerName, regist_date as registDate, updater_id as updaterId, updater_name as updaterName, update_date as updateDate, convert(varchar,end_date,102) as endDate, approve_date as approveDate, request_reason as requestReason, reject_reason as rejectReason, file_name as fileName, ecm_file_yn as ecmFileYn, req_type as reqType, forever_yn as foreverYn from ikep4_officesupplies where officesupplies_id = #officesuppliesId# and is_delete = '0'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ikep4_officesupplies SET APPROVE_STATUS = #approveStatus#, approve_user_id = #approveUserId#, approve_date = GETDATE(), reject_reason = #rejectReason# WHERE USB_ID = #officesuppliesId#

UPDATE ikep4_officesupplies_except SET product_name = #productName#, product_no = #productNo#, update_date = GETDATE(), updater_id = #updaterId#, updater_name = #updaterName# WHERE product_no = #productNo#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ikep4_officesupplies_except ( product_name, product_no, register_id, register_name, regist_date, updater_id, updater_name, update_date ) VALUES ( #productName#, #productNo#, #registerId#, #registerName#, GETDATE(), #updaterId#, #updaterName#, GETDATE() )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ikep4_officesupplies SET product_name = #productName#, product_no = #productNo#, category1 = #category1#, category2 = #category2#, remark = #remark#, amount1 = #amount1#, unit = #unit#, price1 = #price1#, price2 = #price2#, status1 = #status1#, regist_date = GETDATE(), update_date = GETDATE(), updater_id = #updaterId#, updater_name = #updaterName# WHERE officesupplies_id = #officesuppliesId#
UPDATE ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager SET team_leader_id = #teamLeaderId#, team_manager_id = #teamManagerId#, use_yn = #status# WHERE team_id = #teamId#

UPDATE ikep4_officesupplies SET status1 = #status1# ,regist_date = GETDATE()
,team_reviewer_id = #teamReviewerId# ,team_reviewer_name = #teamReviewerName# ,team_review_date = GETDATE()
,team_appr_id = #teamApprId# ,team_appr_name = #teamApprName# ,team_appr_date = GETDATE()
,team_appr_id = #teamApprId# ,team_appr_name = #teamApprName# ,team_appr_date = GETDATE()
WHERE officesupplies_id = #officesuppliesId#
and status1 = 'S'
and status1 = 'C'
and status1 = 'C'

UPDATE ikep4_officesupplies SET status2 = #status2# ,regist_date = GETDATE()
,manage_reviewer_id = #manageReviewerId# ,manage_reviewer_name = #manageReviewerName# ,manage_review_date = GETDATE()
,manage_appr_id = #manageApprId# ,manage_appr_name = #manageApprName# ,manage_appr_date = GETDATE()
,manage_appr_id = #manageApprId# ,manage_appr_name = #manageApprName# ,manage_appr_date = GETDATE()
WHERE officesupplies_id = #officesuppliesId#

UPDATE ikep4_officesupplies SET status2 = #status2#, regist_date = GETDATE()
,manage_reviewer_id = #manageReviewerId# ,manage_reviewer_name = #manageReviewerName# ,manage_review_date = GETDATE()
,manage_appr_id = #manageApprId# ,manage_appr_name = #manageApprName# ,manage_appr_date = GETDATE()
,manage_appr_id = #manageApprId# ,manage_appr_name = #manageApprName# ,manage_appr_date = GETDATE()
WHERE team_id = #teamId#
and status1 = 'A' and isnull(status2,'') =''
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'C'
and status1 = 'A' and status2 = 'C'
and convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) = convert(varchar(6), GETDATE(), 112)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT officesupplies_id as officesuppliesId, product_name as productName, product_no as productNo, register_id as registerId, register_name as registerName, regist_date as registDate, updater_id as updaterId, updater_name as updaterName, update_date as updateDate, price2 as price2, unit as unit, status1 as status1, status2 as status2, price1 as price1, amount1 as amount1, category1 as category1, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category1) as categoryName1, category2 as category2, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category2) as categoryName2, remark as remark, team_id as teamId, (select group_name from ikep4_ev_group g where g.group_id = team_id) as teamName from ikep4_officesupplies WHERE officesupplies_id
#officesuppliesIds[]#

SELECT officesupplies_id as officesuppliesId, product_name as productName, product_no as productNo, register_id as registerId, register_name as registerName, regist_date as registDate, updater_id as updaterId, updater_name as updaterName, update_date as updateDate, price2 as price2, unit as unit, status1 as status1, status2 as status2, price1 as price1, amount1 as amount1, category1 as category1, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category1) as categoryName1, category2 as category2, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category2) as categoryName2, remark as remark, team_id as teamId, (select group_name from ikep4_ev_group g where g.group_id = team_id) as teamName from ikep4_officesupplies WHERE team_id
#teamIds[]#

SELECT officesupplies_id as officesuppliesId, product_name as productName, product_no as productNo, register_id as registerId, register_name as registerName, regist_date as registDate, updater_id as updaterId, updater_name as updaterName, update_date as updateDate, price2 as price2, unit as unit, status1 as status1, status2 as status2, price1 as price1, amount1 as amount1, category1 as category1, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category1) as categoryName1, category2 as category2, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category2) as categoryName2, remark as remark, team_id as teamId, (select group_name from ikep4_ev_group g where g.group_id = team_id) as teamName from ikep4_officesupplies WHERE team_id
#teamIds[]#
and status2 = 'A' and convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) = convert(varchar(6), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 112)

SELECT officesupplies_id as officesuppliesId, product_name as productName, product_no as productNo, register_id as registerId, register_name as registerName, regist_date as registDate, updater_id as updaterId, updater_name as updaterName, update_date as updateDate, price2 as price2, unit as unit, status1 as status1, status2 as status2, price1 as price1, amount1 as amount1, category1 as category1, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category1) as categoryName1, category2 as category2, (select category_name from ikep4_officesupplies_category where category_id = category2) as categoryName2, remark as remark, team_id as teamId, (select group_name from ikep4_ev_group g where g.group_id = team_id) as teamName from ikep4_officesupplies WHERE team_id
#teamIds[]#
and status2 = 'C' and convert(varchar(6), regist_date, 112) = convert(varchar(6), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 112)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ikep4_officesupplies SET IS_DELETE = #isDelete#, update_date = GETDATE() WHERE USB_ID = #officesuppliesId#

UPDATE ikep4_officesupplies_period SET
start_date = #startDate#, end_date = #endDate#,
status = #status# where year = #year# and month = #month#
sqlMap.select: select convert(varchar,start_date,102) as startDate, convert(varchar,end_date,102) as endDate from ikep4_officesupplies_period

select team_name as teamName, team_leader_id as teamLeaderId, team_manager_id as teamManagerId, (select user_name+'('+team_name+')' from ikep4_ev_user where user_id = team_leader_id) as teamLeaderName, (select user_name+'('+team_name+')' from ikep4_ev_user where user_id = team_manager_id) as teamManagerName, team_id as teamId, use_yn as useYn from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager where team_id = #teamId#
select year,month,status,convert(varchar,start_date,102) as startDate, convert(varchar,end_date,102) as endDate from ikep4_officesupplies_period where year = #year# order by year,month

select team_name as teamName, team_leader_id as teamLeaderId, team_manager_id as teamManagerId, (select user_name+'('+team_name+')' from ikep4_ev_user where user_id = team_leader_id) as teamLeaderName, (select user_name+'('+team_name+')' from ikep4_ev_user where user_id = team_manager_id) as teamManagerName, team_id as teamId, use_yn as useYn from ikep4_officesupplies_team_manager

select user_id as managerId from IKEP4_EV_USER_ROLE where role_id = ( select role_id from IKEP4_EV_ROLE where role_name = #officesuppliesadm#) and user_id in (select user_id from IKEP4_EV_USER where user_status = 'C') union select user_id as managerId from IKEP4_EV_USER_GROUP where group_id in( select group_id from IKEP4_EV_GROUP_ROLE where role_id = ( select role_id from IKEP4_EV_ROLE where role_name = #officesuppliesadm#)) and user_id in (select user_id from IKEP4_EV_USER where user_status = 'C')
